summary.description: > VERY_LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Constructing Reference Genome Single Lab', 'Phytozome' (bio.tools/phytozome), 'MinION', '895,678' | The Possibility to Use Oxford Nanopore Technology | Ultrafast consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly of long uncorrected reads. http://genome.cshlp.org/content/early/2017/01/18/gr.214270.116 Note: This was the original repository which will no longer be officially maintained. Please use the new official repository here: | Racon is intended as a standalone consensus module to correct raw contigs generated by rapid assembly methods which do not include a consensus step | Consensus module for raw de novo DNA assembly of long uncorrected reads
summary.name: Racon
